sentences.sContent: We moved here because there was very little crime.
sentences.sCn: 我们搬到这里来是因为这里的犯罪率很低。

sentences.sContent: Police officers are being given new powers to help combat crime.
sentences.sCn: 警官们被赋予新的权力帮助他们打击犯罪。

sentences.sContent: a police crackdown on car crime
sentences.sCn: 警察对汽车犯罪活动的一次严厉打击

sentences.sContent: a town with a relatively low crime rate
sentences.sCn: 犯罪率相对较低的一个城镇

sentences.sContent: ...The incidence of teenage crime and misbehavior is decreasing nowadays...
...There isn't much violent crime in a small town like Green Ville...
...Specifically she covers crime in the Green Ville area...
...Florence is very interested in this type of crime and tries to write a long article about each one...
...Miss Hayes enjoys working for a newspaper but she sometimes gets unhappy about all the crime she has to report...
...crime rates have been on the rise over the years...
...is safer than it’s ever been; it’s ranked 36th in crime among all American cities...

synos.tran: 罪行，犯罪；罪恶；犯罪活动

phrases.pCn: 违反人道罪；危害人类罪

words.tran: 控告的；使负罪的；责难的
